nodes.text: Korgath was a Taloron infiltrator agent for the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
Kogath was a former member of the Taloron Hunters when he joined the Alliance, he became a member of the Scandium Team.
Korgath was considered the luckiest Scandium, because he survived many high-risk situations.
During the Wellte-ir Massacre, Korgath was one of the six survivors of the Scandium Team. After that, the Scandium Team was dismantled, but Korgath's further activities are unknown.
